M

makeAssociation(int, String, int, int) - Method in class model.scope.ScopeGraph
Firstly, establishs a DeclarationEdge between a Scope and its Declaration.
makeDeclaration(int, String, int) - Method in class model.scope.ScopeGraph
Establish a DeclrationEdge between a Scope and a Declaration Example: Add Declaration x1 to Scope1 ScopeGraph scopeGraph = new ScopeGraph(); scopeGraph.generateScope(5); scopeGraph.makeDeclaration(1, "x", 1);
makeDirectEdge(int, int) - Method in class model.scope.ScopeGraph
Establish a DeclrationEdge between a Parent Scope and a Children Scope Example: establish DirectEdge between Scope 1 and Scope 2 ScopeGraph scopeGraph = new ScopeGraph(); scopeGraph.generateScope(5); scopeGraph.makeDirectEdge(2, 1);
makeNominalEdge(int, String, int) - Method in class model.scope.ScopeGraph
Firstly, establishs a NominalEdge between a Scope and its Reference.
makeReference(int, String, int) - Method in class model.scope.ScopeGraph
Establishs a ReferenceEdge between a Scope and its Reference Example: Adds the Reference x4 to Scope1 ScopeGraph scopeGraph = new ScopeGraph(); scopeGraph.generateScope(1); scopeGraph.makeReference(1, "x", 4);
model.scope - package model.scope
